title: General Settings
content:
## Accessing General Settings

1. Click the **Settings** gear icon ⚙️ (or press `Ctrl+,`)
2. Select the **General** tab (first tab)

## Language Preferences

**English / עברית (Hebrew)**
- Select your preferred language
- Changes take effect immediately
- Switches entire interface including menus, dialogs, and messages
- RTL (right-to-left) layout automatically applied for Hebrew

**Switching languages:**
- Click language radio button
- Interface updates instantly
- No restart required

## Startup Behavior

**Launch on Windows startup**
- ☑ Auto-start when you log in to Windows
- App launches hidden in system tray
- Recommended for daily users
- Saves time before presentations

**Start minimized to system tray**
- ☑ Launch hidden in background
- No main window appears on startup
- Access via system tray icon
- Reduces desktop clutter

**Recommended combination:**
- Enable both for seamless daily use
- App ready when you need it
- Minimal interruption

## User Interface Options

**Show notification balloons**
- ☑ Display operation results as notifications
- Shows success/failure messages
- Appears from system tray
- Auto-dismisses after 5 seconds
- Recommended: Keep enabled

**Confirm before power off**
- ☑ Ask before turning projector off
- Prevents accidental power-off
- Shows confirmation dialog
- Uncheck to skip confirmation (faster operation)

## Updates

**Check for updates automatically**
- ☑ Weekly check for new versions
- Runs in background
- Notifies you if update available
- Does not download/install automatically

**Check Now button**
- Manually check for updates
- Immediate check
- Shows current version and latest available

> **Tip:** Enable "Launch on Windows startup" if you use the projector daily. The app will be ready in the system tray when you need it.
